ROW.MAP: <situation name="EII_Current_MsgStats" ><class name="ITM_Message_Statistics" /><slot slotName="msg" ><literalString value="MQ--Queue $Message_Statistics.Queue_Name$ Has A New Message That Is $Message_Statistics.Newest_Message_Seconds$ Old, Total Msgs=$Message_Statistics.Total_Messages$" /></slot><slot slotName="msg_catalog" ><literalString value="noshow" /></slot><slot slotName="NotifyAction" ><literalString value="11" /></slot><slot slotName="NotifyCategory" ><literalString value="2" /></slot><slot slotName="NotifyEmailGroup" ><literalString value="username@email.com" /></slot></situation>
